definition: to make a circuit/to circle/circle/circumference/lap/cycle/complete/all/all over/thorough/to help financially
Buzhou Mountain, a mountain from Chinese legend

sentences.english: Judgment is that the plan is ill-conceived.
sentences.chinese: 我的意見是計劃考慮不周。

sentences.english: In my work has to avoid some service not attentive place.
sentences.chinese: 在我的工作當中難免有一些服務不周到的地方。

sentences.english: I'm afraid you're not quite right.
sentences.chinese: 我恐怕招待得很不周到。

sentences.english: The waiters were rude and unhelpful, the manager ditto .
sentences.chinese: 這些服務員態度生硬，服務不周，經理也一樣。

sentences.english: Please forgive for my any unthoughtful.
Encounters of this kind have revealed to me the consequences of medically underserved communities.
sentences.chinese: 像這類遭遇顯示了社區醫學服務不周到的結果。

sentences.english: Please forgive me for any inconsiderateness.
I've certainly been remiss about things.
sentences.chinese: 我也真是，辦事就是不周到。

sentences.english: They credited the defeat to poor planning.
sentences.chinese: 他們把失敗歸咎於計劃不周。

sentences.english: Many a customer has been lost through negligence of service.
sentences.chinese: 由於服務不周失去了許多老主顧。

sentences.english: If so ill-conceived local services, please understanding.
sentences.chinese: 若有服務不周的地方請諒解。

sentences.english: The disaster was a result of poor planning.
sentences.chinese: 這次災難是由於計劃不周導致的。

sentences.english: Not only did the restaurant overcharge me, but they hadn't served me well.
sentences.chinese: 餐館不僅要價太高，而且對我的服務也不周到。

sentences.english: Furthermore, the imperfection of law aggravates this trend.
sentences.chinese: 立法的模糊與不周延更加劇了這種趨勢。

sentences.english: Thoughtful men ought not to be  thoughtless about the  drought.
sentences.chinese: 體貼的人不應該對乾旱考慮不周。

definition: to lose one's job/unemployment/not to fulfill one's obligations/to neglect one's job/dereliction of duty
to let sb down/to be unfair/I'm sorry/pardon me (formal)
to fail to pay sufficient attention to/to be negligent in regard to/to be lacking in
